title: go/parser groups comments too aggressively into comment groups
body:
func f() {
	statement // comment1
	// comment2
	// comment3
}

In this piece of code, the 3 comments build a single comment group. Arguably, the 1st
comment is its own comment group, followed by the comment group consisting of comment 2
and 3.

See issue #3139 for a case where this matters.
